text: "Danger Zone" is a 1986 song by Kenny Loggins. It was taken from the soundtrack Top Gun. It went to number 2 in the United States, number 6 in Switzerland, number 7 in Canada, number 12 in Germany and New Zealand, number 13 in Hungary, number 14 in Australia and number 45 in the United Kingdom. Category:1986 songs Category:Kenny Loggins songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Danger Zone (song)
